title: [SOLVED]Imac 24, inch late 2006 Panic Kernel
message:
hey guys have a imac 24-inch Late 2006, and when i push power button i have this error ... 

[url=https://postimg.org/image/d8231rljr/][img]https://s15.postimg.org/d8231rljr/20161007_144437.jpg[/img][/url]


BGA problem?? or have a capacitor like board 820-2850 A we need to switch ? 

cumps

title: [SOLVED]Imac 24, inch late 2006 Panic Kernel
message: You are trying to boot 10.8 on a machine that does only supported up to 10.7.
